turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to track my order and the tracking link isn't working. I'm getting really frustrated!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I am very sorry to hear that you are experiencing issues with your tracking link. Can you please provide your order number so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, it's #12345. And while you're at it, the estimated delivery date said today but the tracking hasn't updated in three days. What's going on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing your order number. I am currently looking into this for you. Our system indicates that the package is with the courier and is still expected to be delivered today, although the tracking information may not have been updated, please give it a few more hours. Sometimes the tracking data can lag behind the physical movement of the package. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's slightly reassuring. One last question, and this is a bit tricky: I want to return an item, but I threw away the original packaging. Can I still do that, and what's the process?
